Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: L. Allis
Reviews.Content: Love this laptop - perfectly fits my needs.  Only issue is that sometimes it freezes up and I have to restart it - but doesn't happen too frequently.  Powerful, light, and flexible.

Reviews.Title: Recommended
Reviews.Author: Ilan Atias
Reviews.Content: Excellent convertible laptop, very fast, great bright screen, very silence, excellent keyboard. The only downside: when you rotate the screen to the other side to use it as a tablet, the content of the screen is not rotating automatically, and you get an upside down picture on the screen. To overcome this situation, you have to use the Ctrl+Alt+arrow-down.
